aiSectionHeader.tagline: 👋 We have launched voice-ai infra for developers
aiSectionHeader.subTitle: AI Identity handles voice calls, whatsapp, and texts on your behalf, humanly. It understands context, remove clutter, takes action, and keep tabs on everything to give you, your freedom back.
aiHowItWorks.sectionSubTitle: From Calls to Clarity in Simple Steps
aiHowItWorks.title1: Create an AI identity with a unique phone number.
aiHowItWorks.desc1: Anyone can call or WhatsApp your AI identity for personal and professional conversations. It handles the call and patches you in if needed.
aiHowItWorks.title2: Offload noise, focus on things that matter
aiHowItWorks.desc2: Streamline your communication as AI Identity filters excessive information. Cut through cluttered calls and messages with smart automation.
aiHowItWorks.title3: Stay informed with real-time insights and smart context tracking
aiHowItWorks.desc3: Never lose track of a conversation. Your AI identity provides context, summaries, and key insights — even months later.
aiHowItWorks.title4: Execute tasks faster with smart workflows
aiHowItWorks.desc4: From scheduling meetings to updating tools, your AI connects with what you already use and automates actions directly from conversations.
aiHero.subHeading: Unpod connects with existing communication channels, data, tools. It streamlines conversations and executes actions on your behalf.
aiCta.title: Ready to transform your communication?
aiCta.description: Join thousands of businesses and individuals who trust our AI voice identities to handle their most important conversations.
aiCta.note: No credit card required • Free 14-day trial • Cancel anytime
sipSectionHeader.heading: For Voice AI
sipSectionHeader.subTitle: Connect your SIP/telephony providers directly to Voice AI infrastructure. One platform, endless possibilities for developers building the future of communication.
sipLightning.heading: Integration in < 5 mins
sipLightning.description: While our competitors can take days or weeks to get you up and running, VoiceBridge gets you integrated and making calls in under 5 mins. We have streamlined the entire process with our developer-first API and comprehensive SDKs, making integration incredibly simple for everyone.
sipPlatforms.heading: Connect with
sipPlatforms.subHeading: Seamlessly integrate with the platforms you already trust. Our unified API connects you to the best-in-class voice and communication infrastructure.
sipVoiceBridge.heading: Why Unpod.dev?
sipVoiceBridge.subHeading: We’ve built the Voice AI bridge we wanted to use, focused on creating the best developer experience. And if you give us a try, we’re sure you’ll agree.
sipVoiceBridge.feature1.title: Instant Setup
sipVoiceBridge.feature1.desc: Get your SIP-Voice AI bridge running in under 5 minutes, while competitors require hours of complex configuration and setup.
sipVoiceBridge.feature2.title: Developer-First Platform
sipVoiceBridge.feature2.desc: Our platform is designed to be intuitive and easy to work with, making Voice AI integration a breeze with multiple platforms.
sipVoiceBridge.feature3.title: Multi-Provider Support
sipVoiceBridge.feature3.desc: Connect with Vapi, LiveKit, Daily, and more Voice AI providers through a single unified interface, with no vendor lock-in.
sipVoiceBridge.feature4.title: Global Edge Network
sipVoiceBridge.feature4.desc: Automatically route calls through our worldwide infrastructure for optimal latency and call quality in 150+ countries.
sipVoiceBridge.feature5.title: Enterprise Security
sipVoiceBridge.feature5.desc: Built-in compliance with HIPAA, ISO-27001, and telecom regulations, ensuring your voice data is always protected.
sipVoiceBridge.feature6.title: Real-time Analytics
sipVoiceBridge.feature6.desc: Monitor call quality, latency, and AI performance with detailed analytics and alerts to optimize your voice applications.
sipInnovation.description: Stop spending months building telecom infrastructure. Our platform handles the complexity so you can focus on creating amazing voice experiences for your users.
sipInnovation.check1: Reduce development time by 80% with pre-built integrations
sipInnovation.check2: Scale from 10 to 10M+ concurrent calls seamlessly
sipInnovation.check4: Pay-as-you-scale pricing with no upfront costs
sipInnovation.check5: 24/7 expert support and dedicated success managers
sipInnovation.card1.title: Protocols
sipInnovation.card2.title: Audio Codecs
sipInnovation.card3.title: Global Reach
sipInnovation.card4.title: Security
sipCallAction.heading: Ready to Transform
sipCallAction.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who are already building the future of voice communication with our SIP+WebRTC bridge platform.
sipCallAction.note: No credit card required • Cancel anytime
contactUs.title: Request for Early Access
contactUs.subtitle: Looking to experience new age AI Identity for yourself? Request now and we’ll get back to you.

bridgeNew.overviewDescription: Unpod enables businesses to rent Regional phone numbers and seamlessly integrate with Voice Infrastructure Providers and Voice AI agents. You can configure your SIP trunk, connect with providers like LiveKit, Vapi, etc and meet regulatory compliance for smooth operations.
bridgeNew.telephonyDesc: Provision Regional phone numbers or add your own SIP trunk to start making and receiving calls.
bridgeNew.voiceDesc: Connect to Livekit, Daily, Vapi and more Voice AI infrastructure providers to enable voice services with low latency and high reliability.

landing.headerTitle: Data collaboration, research & decision insights for enterprise teams!
landing.headerSubTitle: We help you to read through documents, spreadsheets and reports with superhuman speed. You can connect with various public and private data repositories, read through it, generate curated insights, memos and reports for your decision making and diligence work.

hero.heading: An Intelligent identity
hero.subtitle: AI Identity handles voice calls, whatsapp, and texts on your behalf, humanly. It understands context, remove clutter, takes action, and keep tabs on everything to give you, your freedom back.
aiNetwork.title: Build and Connect with AI Identity Network.
aiNetwork.subTitle: Create specialized AI identities that work together in an intelligent ecosystem
aiNetwork.identityHubDescription: Create and manage multiple AI identities in one unified network. Each identity can have unique personalities, skills, and purposes.
aiNetwork.routingDescription: Smart discovery system automatically connects callers to the most suitable AI identity based on their needs and the identity's capabilities.
aiNetwork.ecosystemDescription: AI identities can work together, share knowledge, and refer callers to other identities in the network for specialized assistance.
aiShowcase.title: Experience the Magic
aiShowcase.subTitle: See Your AI Identity in Action
aiShowcase.description: Interact with a live AI identity and experience how seamlessly it handles conversations. Just one call shows you the power of having an AI working for you.
identityMarketplace.title: Meet the Identities
identityMarketplace.subTitle: AI Identities Built for Every Need
identityMarketplace.description: Browse from a growing network of AI identities — each with a unique name and purpose. From handling customer support, to qualifying leads, to managing your personal inbox — there's an AI identity for you.
identityMarketplace.user1.name: Alex
identityMarketplace.user2.name: Maya
identityMarketplace.user3.name: Raj
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro1: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.
privacyPolicy.intro2: We use Your Personal data to provide and improve the Service. By using the Service, You agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.interpretationDescription: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
privacyPolicy.forPurpose: For the purposes of this Privacy Policy:
privacyPolicy.account: means a unique account created for You to access our Service or parts of our Service.
privacyPolicy.affiliate: means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where 'control' means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
privacyPolicy.company: refers to ESSENTIAL INTERFACES PRIVATE LIMITED F-539, Phase-8B Sector-74, 3rd Floor, Mohali Tower, Balongi, Rupnagar, S.A.S.Nagar (Mohali), Punjab, India, 160055. CIN - U62010PB2025PTC066615
privacyPolicy.cookies: are small files that are placed on Your computer, mobile device or any other device by a website, containing the details of Your browsing history on that website among its many uses.
privacyPolicy.device: means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cellphone or a digital tablet.
privacyPolicy.personalDataDesc: is any information that relates to an identified or identifiable individual.
privacyPolicy.serviceProviderDesc: means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Company.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartySocialDesc: refers to any website or social network website through which a User can log in or create an account to use the Service.
privacyPolicy.usageDataDesc: refers to data collected automatically, either generated by the use of the Service or from the Service infrastructure itself.
privacyPolicy.youDesc: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service.
privacyPolicy.collectingTitle: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data
privacyPolicy.personalDataCollected: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:
privacyPolicy.data.name: First name and last name
privacyPolicy.data.address: Address, State, Province, ZIP/Postal code, City
privacyPolicy.usageDataPara1: Usage Data is collected automatically when using the Service.
privacyPolicy.usageDataPara2: Usage Data may include information such as Your Device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, the pages of our Service that You visit, the time and date of Your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacyPolicy.usageDataPara3: When You access the Service by or through a mobile device, We may collect certain information automatically, including, but not limited to, the type of mobile device You use, Your mobile device unique ID, the IP address of Your mobile device, Your mobile operating system, the type of mobile Internet browser You use, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
privacyPolicy.usageDataPara4: We may also collect information that Your browser sends whenever You visit our Service or when You access the Service by or through a mobile device.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyInfoTitle: Information from Third-Party Social Media Services
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyInfoDesc: The Company allows You to create an account and log in to use the Service through the following Third-party Social Media Services:
privacyPolicy.thirdPartySocialAccessDesc: If You decide to register through or otherwise grant us access to a hird-Party Social Media Service, We may collect Personal data that is already associated with Your Third-Party Social Media Service's account, such as Your name, Your email address, Your activities or Your contact list associated with that account.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartySocialAdditional: You may also have the option of sharing additional information with the Company through Your Third-Party Social Media Service's account. If You choose to provide such information and Personal Data, during registration or otherwise, You are giving the Company permission to use, share, and store it in a manner consistent with this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.technologiesAndCookiesDes: We use Cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on Our Service and store certain information. Tracking technologies used are beacons, tags, and scripts to collect and track information and to improve and analyze Our Service. The technologies We use may include:
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: A cookie is a small file placed on Your Device. You can instruct Your browser to refuse all Cookies or to indicate when a Cookie is being sent. However, if You do not accept Cookies, You may not be able to use some parts of our Service. Unless you have adjusted Your browser setting so that it will refuse Cookies, our Service may use Cookies.
privacyPolicy.webBeaconsText: Certain sections of our Service and our emails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also referred to as clear gifs, pixel tags, and single-pixel gifs) that permit the Company, for example, to count users who have visited those pages or opened an email and for other related website statistics (for example, recording the popularity of a certain section and verifying system and server integrity).
privacyPolicy.cookieTypesText: Cookies can be 'Persistent' or 'Session' Cookies. Persistent Cookies remain on Your personal computer or mobile device when You go offline, while Session Cookies are deleted as soon as You close Your web browser. You can learn more about cookies on TermsFeed website article.
privacyPolicy.cookieUsageText: We use both Session and Persistent Cookies for the purposes set out below:
privacyPolicy.necessaryCookiesPurpose: Purpose: These Cookies are essential to provide You with services available through the Website and to enable You to use some of its features. They help to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts. Without these Cookies, the services that You have asked for cannot be provided, and We only use these Cookies to provide You with those services.
privacyPolicy.acceptanceCookiesPurpose: Purpose: These Cookies identify if users have accepted the use of cookies on the Website.
privacyPolicy.functionalityCookiesPurpos: Purpose: These Cookies allow us to remember choices You make when You use the Website, such as remembering your login details or language preference. The purpose of these Cookies is to provide You with a more personal experience and to avoid You having to re-enter your preferences every time You use the Website.
privacyPolicy.moreInfoText: For more information about the cookies we use and your choices regarding cookies, please visit our Cookies Policy or the Cookies section of our Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.personalDataIntro: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.purpose.serviceTitle: To provide and maintain our Service
privacyPolicy.purpose.serviceText: Including to monitor the usage of our Service.
privacyPolicy.purpose.accountText: To manage Your registration as a user of the Service. The Personal Data You provide can give You access to different functionalities of the Service that are available to You as a registered user.
privacyPolicy.purpose.contractTitle: For the performance of a contract
privacyPolicy.purpose.contractText: The development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the Service.
privacyPolicy.purpose.contactText: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including security updates.
privacyPolicy.purpose.offersTitle: To provide You with news and special offers
privacyPolicy.purpose.offersText: General information about other goods, services and events we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
privacyPolicy.purpose.requestsText: To attend and manage Your requests to Us.
privacyPolicy.purpose.businessTransfersT: We may use Your information to evaluate or conduct a merger, divestiture, restructuring, reorganization, dissolution, or other sale or transfer of some or all of Our assets.
privacyPolicy.purpose.otherText: We may use Your information for other purposes, such as data analysis, identifying usage trends, determining the effectiveness of our promotional campaigns and to evaluate and improve our Service, products, services, marketing and your experience.
privacyPolicy.dataSharingIntro: We may share Your personal information in the following situations:
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
privacyPolicy.withServiceProvidersDesc: We may share Your personal information with Service Providers to monitor and analyze the use of our Service, to contact You.
privacyPolicy.businessTransfersDesc: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of Our business to another company.
privacyPolicy.affiliatesDesc: We may share Your information with Our affiliates, in which case we will require those affiliates to honor this Privacy Policy. Affiliates include Our parent company and any other subsidiaries, joint venture partners or other companies that We control or that are under common control with Us.
privacyPolicy.businessPartnersDesc: We may share Your information with Our business partners to offer You certain products, services or promotions.
privacyPolicy.otherUsersDesc: when You share personal information or otherwise interact in the public areas with other users, such information may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside. If You interact with other users or register through a Third-Party Social Media Service, Your contacts on the Third-Party Social Media Service may see Your name, profile, pictures and description of Your activity. Similarly, other users will be able to view descriptions of Your activity, communicate with You and view Your profile.
privacyPolicy.consentDesc: We may disclose Your personal information for any other purpose with Your consent.
privacyPolicy.retentionDesc1: The Company will retain Your Personal Data only for as long as is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy. We will retain and use Your Personal Data to the extent necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our legal agreements and policies.
privacyPolicy.retentionDesc2: The Company will also retain Usage Data for internal analysis purposes. Usage Data is generally retained for a shorter period of time, except when used to strengthen security, improve functionality, or when legally required.
privacyPolicy.transferDesc1: Your information, including Personal Data, is processed at the Company's operating offices and other locations where processing parties are situated. This means your data may be transferred to and maintained on computers outside your jurisdiction.
privacyPolicy.transferDesc2: Your consent to this Privacy Policy followed by submission of such information represents your agreement to that transfer.
privacyPolicy.transferDesc3: The Company will take all reasonably necessary steps to ensure that Your data is treated securely and in accordance with this Privacy Policy.
privacyPolicy.deleteDesc1: You have the right to delete or request that We assist in deleting the Personal Data that We have collected about You.
privacyPolicy.deleteDesc2: Our Service may give You the ability to delete certain information about You from within the Service.
privacyPolicy.deleteDesc3: You may update, amend, or delete Your information at any time by signing in to Your Account and visiting account settings or by contacting Us.
privacyPolicy.deleteDesc4: Please note that We may retain certain information when required by law or lawful basis.
privacyPolicy.businessTransactionDesc: If the Company is involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, Your Personal Data may be transferred. Notice will be provided before the transfer.
privacyPolicy.lawEnforcementDesc: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data if required by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.
privacyPolicy.otherLegalDesc: The Company may disclose Your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary.
privacyPolicy.protectRights: Protect and defend the rights or property of the Company
privacyPolicy.preventWrongdoing: Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the Service
privacyPolicy.personalSafety: Protect the personal safety of Users of the Service or the public
privacyPolicy.securityDesc: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to protect Your data, We cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicy.childrenPrivacyDesc1: Our Service does not address anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13. If you believe your child has provided us with Personal Data, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.childrenPrivacyDesc2: If consent from a parent is required by law, we may require parental consent before collecting or using such information.
privacyPolicy.linksDesc1: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites not operated by Us. We encourage You to review the Privacy Policy of every site You visit.
privacyPolicy.linksDesc2: We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content or privacy practices of third-party sites or services.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc1: We may update Our Privacy Policy from time to time by posting the updated version on this page.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc2: We will notify You via email or a prominent notice on Our Service before changes become effective.
privacyPolicy.changesDesc3: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes are effective when posted.
privacyPolicy.contactDesc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us:
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.
terms.interpretationDesc: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.
terms.definitionsIntro: For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions:
terms.defAffiliateDesc: means an entity that controls, is controlled by or is under common control with a party, where "control" means ownership of 50% or more of the shares, equity interest or other securities entitled to vote for election of directors or other managing authority.
terms.defCompanyDesc: (referred to as either "the Company", "We", "Us" or "Our" in this Agreement) refers to ESSENTIAL INTERFACES PRIVATE LIMITED F-539, Phase-8B Sector-74, 3rd Floor, Mohali Tower, Balongi, Rupnagar, S.A.S.Nagar (Mohali), Punjab, India, 160055.
terms.defDeviceDesc: means any device that can access the Service such as a computer, a cell phone or a digital tablet.
terms.defTermsDesc: (also referred as "Terms") mean these Terms and Conditions that form the entire agreement between You and the Company regarding the use of the Service. This Terms and Conditions agreement has been created with the help of the Terms and Conditions Generator.
terms.defThirdPartyDesc: means any services or content (including data, information, products or services) provided by a third-party that may be displayed, included or made available by the Service.
terms.defYouDesc: means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable.
terms.ackPara1: These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service.
terms.ackPara2: Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.
terms.ackPara3: By accessing or using the Service You agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If You disagree with any part of these Terms and Conditions then You may not access the Service.
terms.ackPara4: You represent that you are over the age of 13. The Company does not permit those under 13 to use the Service.
terms.ackPara5: Your access to and use of the Service is also conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with the Privacy Policy of the Company. Our Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your personal information when You use the Application or the Website and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You. Please read Our Privacy Policy carefully before using Our Service.
terms.linksPara1: Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company.
terms.linksPara2: The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.
terms.linksPara3: We strongly advise You to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third-party web sites or services that You visit.
terms.terminationPara1: We may terminate or suspend Your access immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if You breach these Terms and Conditions.
terms.terminationPara2: Upon termination, Your right to use the Service will cease immediately.
terms.limitationPara: Unpod assumes no liability or responsibility for any errors or omissions in the content of our Web site. Your use of this Web site is at your own risk. Under no circumstances and under no legal theory shall Unpod, its suppliers, or any other party involved in creating, producing, or delivering this Web site’s contents be liable to you or any other person for any indirect, direct, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your access to, or use of, this Web site.
terms.disclaimerPara1: The Service is provided to You "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its and their respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service, including all implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, title and non-infringement, and warranties that may arise out of course of dealing, course of performance, usage or trade practice. Without limitation to the foregoing, the Company provides no warranty or undertaking, and makes no representation of any kind that the Service will meet Your requirements, achieve any intended results, be compatible or work with any other software, applications, systems or services, operate without interruption, meet any performance or reliability standards or be error free or that any errors or defects can or will be corrected.
terms.disclaimerPara2: Without limiting the foregoing, neither the Company nor any of the company's provider makes any representation or warranty of any kind, express or implied: (i) as to the operation or availability of the Service, or the information, content, and materials or products included thereon; (ii) that the Service will be uninterrupted or error-free; (iii) as to the accuracy, reliability, or currency of any information or content provided through the Service; or (iv) that the Service, its servers, the content, or e-mails sent from or on behalf of the Company are free of viruses, scripts, trojan horses, worms, malware, timebombs or other harmful components.
terms.disclaimerPara3: Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion of certain types of warranties or limitations on applicable statutory rights of a consumer, so some or all of the above exclusions and limitations may not apply to You. But in such a case the exclusions and limitations set forth in this section shall be applied to the greatest extent enforceable under applicable law.
terms.governingPara: The laws of the Country, excluding its conflicts of law rules, shall govern this Terms and Your use of the Service. Your use of the Application may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws.
terms.disputesPara: If You have any concern or dispute about the Service, You agree to first try to resolve the dispute informally by contacting the Company.
terms.euPara: If You are a European Union consumer, you will benefit from any mandatory provisions of the law of the country in which You are resident.
terms.usPara: You represent and warrant that (i) You are not located in a country that is subject to the United States government embargo, or that has been designated by the United States government as a "terrorist supporting" country, and (ii) You are not listed on any United States government list of prohibited or restricted parties.
terms.severabilityPara: If any provision of these Terms is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.
terms.waiverPara: Except as provided herein, the failure to exercise a right or to require performance of an obligation under these Terms shall not affect a party's ability to exercise such right or require such performance at any time thereafter nor shall the waiver of a breach constitute a waiver of any subsequent breach.
terms.translationPara: These Terms and Conditions may have been translated if We have made them available to You on our Service. You agree that the original English text shall prevail in the case of a dispute.
terms.changesTitle: Changes to These Terms and Conditions
terms.changesPara1: We reserve the right, at Our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material We will make reasonable efforts to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at Our sole discretion.
terms.changesPara2: By continuing to access or use Our Service after those revisions become effective, You agree to be bound by the revised terms. If You do not agree to the new terms, in whole or in part, please stop using the website and the Service.
terms.contactIntro: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, You can contact us:
terms.contactWebLabel: By visiting this page on our website:
